Name: filter-by-External-association
Description: Allow you to filter items on a node depending on a External association with the first parent

Options.Description: Set the layout javascript class name you want to use to display this node
Set the id of the node which should be display if the External association exist
Set the id of the node which should be display if there is no External association

Options.DisplayName: Display if all selected association of an association type
Options.Description: Element need to have all selected association of an association type

Options.DisplayName: Display if at least one association in all association type
Options.Description: Element need to have at least one association in all association type
If you want to use, another custom layout with this layout, you can fill the options here. Option1:ValueOption1#Option2:ValueOption2
